channel.title: Shop Handler Problem? [READ]
channel.description:
Compiles successfully, i open runserver and it says this:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 7 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:28) Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:5555 [/code]
Ehhhhh? I'll get someone to rep you if you can tell me =]
